About.label: About Me
value: Hi I am Pranshu Agrawal, I am from New Delhi, India.
● I am a Front End Developer, proficient in JS Based Frameworks and Web Technologies.
● I have been building stuff using these since 2010 and professionally doing this from 2014.
● I have done my Masters in Information Technology from ABV IIITM, Gwalior. You can read more about it in the education section.
● I work as a freelance fashion photographer. Check my work at https://pranshu.works/photos/

Experience.label: Paytm
value: ● Worked on several products at Paytm, mainly including Netbanking Solution, UAP and Remittance Panel
● Worked on Frontend Banking Solutions and gained enterprise experience on security aspects of web application
● ReactJS, VueJS, NodeJS are the main libraries I have mainly worked on in this organization
● Worked on solutionizing problems related to banking experience and frontend architecture

Experience.label: Frrole
value: ● Lead 2 Frontend products from scratch: Frrole Scout, Frrole DeepSense
● Worked majorly on scalable data visualizations (using highcharts and D3.js) and frontend architecture
● Actively involved in charting out the product design and user experience
